testsuite.name: SolverTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
Numbers should be written in file on separate lines without any additional symbols
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test.
---
Arguments: -in in.txt -out out.txt
Retrieving coefficients 1.0 1.0 2.0 9.0 2.0 4.0 -3.0 1.0 3.0 6.0 -5.0 0.0
Reducing to echelon 2.0 4.0 -3.0 1.0 3.0 6.0 -5.0 0.0 1.0 1.0 2.0 9.0
Reducing to reduced echelon Checking for valid matrix
